Field Documentation

uint32_t mdio_single_command_t::mdi_command

Performs an MDIO access.

When set, this bit self clears upon completion of the access.

uint32_t mdio_single_command_t::op_code

MDIO Op Code 00 = Reserved 01 = Write Access 10 = Read Access 11 = Reserved.

uint32_t mdio_single_command_t::phy_address

Address of external PHY device.

uint32_t mdio_single_command_t::reg_address

Address of register within external PHY.
